PageTitle: display mpls te protection binding protect-tunnel
FuncDef: The display mpls te protection binding protect-tunnel command displays the tunnel protection relationship.
CLIs: display mpls te protection binding protect-tunnel { <tunnel-id> | interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about the protection relationship related to a protection tunnel (that is, a backup tunnel) with a specified ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 65535.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls te protection binding protect-tunnel 101
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the binding between the primary and protection tunnels in a tunnel protection group, run the display mpls te protection binding protect-tunnel command. The command output helps you verify the tunnel protection group configuration.
